description: Developing Flutter WMS apps and Shopware online-shop
Leveraged Flutter, Blazor, and Vue.js to create applications such as a Technician Portal, a Warehouse Management System, perform an ERP system migration, and develop the frontend of a webshop.

Conceptualized and developed user-friendly interfaces in the automotive sector, worked on a hybrid system (MIB/Android) and integrated Amazon Alexa. My tools of choice were design systems like Figma and Sketch, and I supported developers through Git/Jira.

Completed his Bachelor's degree in Media Informatics at the University of Ulm from 2015 to 2021, with a focus on Interactive Systems, Usability Engineering, Web Engineering, and User Interface Software Technology.
